# BITFAM TF activity

## NK cells in MM

Load data and prepare environment:

```{r}
library(Seurat)
library(BITFAM)
```

```{r}
dat <- readRDS("Data/mm_nk.Rds")
dat <- SetIdent(dat,value="new_label")
dat
```
Normalize with BITFAM and run it (considering to filter genes depending on the reuluts)
